subject: Public Speaking
title: Pericles' Funeral Oration
description: A quick win: understand Pericles' Funeral Oration.

hook.text: Pericles honored fallen soldiers while defining Athenian democracy.

buildup.text: He used the dead to inspire the living toward civic duty.

discovery.text: His speech blended grief with patriotism and political vision.

twist.text: Funeral orations became a genre because of Pericles' model.

climax.text: He showed that honoring the dead can mobilize the living.

punchline.text: Speeches for the fallen can build nations.

quiz.question: What did Pericles' oration accomplish?
options: Defined democracy while honoring the fallen
